title: I want to find out when i joined. (With random poll included.)
body:
So i'm sitting here looking at these new rewards for the new season and i think "Hey when did i start playing league of legends?" Now i remember playing on my brothers account a long time ago in season 1 but i don't know what season i made MY account in and i really want to know.


And that poll is for fun because honestly is sounds like a good idea.

replies.body: We can't give out info like this since it's considered personal account info that could be used for account recovery.
